title: Deep Learning for Medical Image Segmentation
abstract: We explore convolutional neural networks for medical image segmentation, achieving strong performance on MRI datasets.

title: Transformer Models for Clinical Text Understanding
abstract: This paper applies transformer-based models to clinical narratives, improving concept extraction and entity linking.

title: Self-Supervised Pretraining for Biomedical NLP
abstract: We present self-supervised pretraining techniques for biomedical language tasks, reducing labeled data requirements.

title: Graph Neural Networks in Drug Discovery
abstract: Graph neural networks are used to predict molecular properties and aid virtual screening in drug discovery pipelines.

title: Contrastive Learning for Scientific Paper Recommendations
abstract: Contrastive learning on citation graphs enhances recommendation quality by capturing semantic relationships among papers.
